inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: uterine fibromatosis, abnormal blood loss, complex hyperplasia with atypia, uterine prolapse

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: need for laparoscopic suture of the vaginal cuff

exclusion.criterion: actual pregnancies or pelvic inflammatory disease
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 17-year-old boy with severe migratory pain in the right lower quadrant of his abdomen, nausea and vomiting, fever, tenderness, rebound tenderness, guarding on palpation, elevated WBC, acute perforated appendicitis with free fluid in the pelvis, phlegmon. Candidate for emergent laparoscopic appendectomy under general anesthesia.
